title: YANKI DIN  丁可欣@香港動物權紀念日

replies.msg:
YANKI DIN 丁可欣@香港動物權紀念日

YANKI DIN 丁可欣是香港女藝人，亦以火雞姐角色活躍於各網絡平台中。她尊重動物的生命和權利，在約三年半前她成為素食者。她在youtube 頻道中拍了一系列以動物作題材的影片，名為「牠們的生活」，希望能讓大家了解動物更多，喚醒人們對不同動物的權利的關注。日常生活中她也喜歡透過社交平台和大家分享的素食生活的心得和體會，希望能鼓勵更多人嘗試成為素食者。

YANKI DIN is a Hong Kong female artist who is also active in various online platforms with the role of a ‘turkey sister’. In order to respect the life and rights of animals, she became a vegetarian for about three and a half years. In her youtube channel, she also has a series of "their life" animal theme, hoping to let everyone know more about animals and awaken people's attention of the rights to animals. she shares experiences and feelings about her vegetarian life through social platforms so as to encourage more people to try to become vegetarians.

#seeyouin2019nard

人都係動物，不過有人似乎無尊重過..
真係好有説服力
